definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇשׁוּר]] Je 5:26, sf. [[יְשׁוּרֶנּוּ]] Job 34:29, etc.; Imv. ms. [[שׁוּר]] Job 35:5;—

behold, c. acc. pers. Nu 23:9, Nu 24:17 (poems in JE, ‖[[רָאָה ]]), [[לאׁ]] [[תְּשׁוּרֵנִי]], subj. eye, Job 24:15, and (= I shall not exist) Job 7:8, cf. Job 20:9 (subj. [[מְקוֹמוֹ]]), Job 17:15; God object Job 34:29, Job 35:14; look, gaze, abs., [[מִן]] loc. Ct So 4:8.

regard with watchful care (subj. ´[[י]]:) Ho 14:9; so, = notice, Job 35:13; regard, observe, acc. rei, God’s word Job 33:14 (Hi De Da al.), so, (reading 2 ms.), Siegf Bu; Du [[יְשִׁיבֶנּוּ]] he (God) retracts it not.

watch stealthily, lie in wait, [[בְּנׇמֵר עַל־דֶּרֶךְ אָשׁוּר]] Ho 13:7 (subj. ´[[י]]:; Meinh Marti [[אֶשְׁקׂד]]; LXX SyrVer Vulgate We Now al. [[אַשּׁוּר]]), Je 5:26 (subj. wicked).—Job 33:27 v. [[שׁיר]].
